message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"above; on top of","sentence":"水在上边。","image_prompt":"A glass of water placed on top of a table, viewed from a slightly elevated angle, in a soft apocalypse animation style, emphasizing the position of the glass above the table.
